indications: Hepatitis, furuncle, extreme thirst, restless Heat, cholelithiasis, urolithiasis, Heat Accumulation
Edema, arthralgia due to Wind-Dampness, osteomyelitis, urinary disturbance, leukorrhea

action.primary: Invigorates the Blood, transforms Phlegm and dissipates nodules

notes: This herb regulates the Stomach to descend adverse Qi.
It is said to harmonize the Middle Jiao and calm the Liver.
It treats osteomyelitis, paralysis and chronic leukotrichia.
Stranguria caused by urolithiasis and regurgitation can be treated by the juice of the vine, which is sweet, Cold, slippery and non-toxic when taken with Ginger Juice.
This herb is usually applied in the treatment of tumors.
This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
It treats esophageal and gastric cancer.
This herb relieves extreme thirst, restless Heat, cholelithiasis, urolithiasis and Heat Accumulation.
The juice of this herb is said to cure regurgitation.
